sentences.en: A cross with a bull - dog has affected for many generations the courage and obstinacy of greyhounds.
sentences.cn: 把猎犬和 斗牛 狗杂交可影响许多代猎犬的勇猛和顽固性.

sentences.en: Cindy's anger usually made him stand firm to the point of obstinacy.
sentences.cn: 辛迪一发怒,常常使他坚持自见,并达到执拗的地步.

sentences.en: He bit the file to English obstinacy and broke his teeth.
sentences.cn: 他要打破英国人的顽固而折断了牙齿.

sentences.en: He bitted the file to English obstinacy and broke his teeth.

sentences.en: He had told Tu Chu - chai that Wu Sun - fu's obstinacy and over - confidence would be his downfall.
sentences.cn: 他说荪甫那样的刚愎 自信 是祸根.

sentences.en: He has a streak of obstinacy in him.
He met the pressing requests of his neighbours with a gentle obstinacy.
sentences.cn: 他不卑不亢地应付他邻居那咄咄逼人的要求.

sentences.en: His obstinacy was bruited about the country - side, and caused great consternation.
sentences.cn: 他那种蛮劲使那一乡议论纷纷, 甚至个个替他捏一把汗.

sentences.en: I might have become a dangerous man with all that stubbornness and obstinacy built into me.
sentences.cn: 我若是养就了那种根深蒂固的犟脾气，也许就成了危险分子。

sentences.en: I resisted the proposal with obstinacy ; and now I began to arm myself with arguments.
sentences.cn: 我顽强地反对他的提议,用许多道理来维护自己.

sentences.en: I resisted the proposal with obstinacy.

sentences.en: In his obstinacy Hung - chien refused to eat anything the Chous had sent.
sentences.cn: 鸿 渐 牛性,不吃周家送来的东西.

sentences.en: It is a very accountable obstinacy.
sentences.cn: 这是一种完全可以理解的固执态度.

sentences.en: Robertson uttered not a word of reflection on his companion for the consequences of his obstinacy.
sentences.cn: 罗伯逊对于他的同伴的固执己见所造成的后果只字未提.

sentences.en: She knew too much of the obstinacy of men to oppose any of their ridiculous humours.
sentences.cn: 她深深懂得男人那股执拗性子,也就不硬去反对这种荒唐想法了.
